content.rendered:
A virtual fall will be about working smarter, not harder. Join us to discuss best practices for running your virtual fall—from fairs, to appointments, interviews, and beyond—entirely in Handshake. We’ll also discuss areas of research we’re exploring to further enhance our virtual capabilities.

Resources shared in the presentation:

  • Slides: Click here for a copy of the slide deck from the presentation.
  • More Virtual Engagement Training: The full course is now available on Handshake Academy.
  • More Q&A opportunities: If you have a question that we weren’t able to get to in the webinar, you may check out our Help Center, reach out to our Support Team, or join us at weekly Virtual Fair Office Hours for virtual fair-specific questions.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Best practices for running your virtual fall—from fairs, to appointments, interviews, and beyond—entirely in Handshake.
